Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Oink> Yes you can. You need an external miner for the pool, like CCminer or nehq. They‚Äôre pinned in the #mining channel. You can even use your wallet to do some threads of solo mining and the external miner to do some threads of pool mining.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Godballz> If you use the exchange and pick some up you can stake. In very simple terms, staking is similar to mining but rather than having hashpower your chances of hitting a block are dependent on the amount you have in your wallet

Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
